mapper.update:
update wx_newsitem
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imagepath = #{imagepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select tc.*, p.user_name as createusername from WX_NEWSITEM tc LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on tc.createuser = p.seq_id where 1=1 ORDER BY tc.createtime
select tc.*, p.user_name as createusername from WX_NEWSITEM tc LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on tc.createuser = p.seq_id where 1=1 and newsid = #{_parameter} ORDER BY sortno asc
select count(1) from WX_NEWSITEM tc where 1=1 and newsid = #{_parameter}
